content.question: A natural monopoly exists when a single firm

choices.label: produces a quantity of output that maximizes the total producer surplus
produces the allocatively efficient quantity of output of a good
has an upward-sloping marginal cost curve
has a downward-sloping average total cost curve over the relevant range of output
sets price equal to marginal cost in order to maximize profit

content.answer: has a downward-sloping average total cost curve over the relevant range of output
